thread.title: The Drive to Unionize Charter Schools
thread.title_full: The Drive to Unionize Charter Schools - WSJ

author: Peter Schaumber
title: The Drive to Unionize Charter Schools
text:
Are charter schools public or private? On the one hand, theyâ€™re designed to be an integral part of state public-education systems. On the other, charter schools are run by private boards, and their operations are exempt from many, though not all, of the regulations that govern traditional public schools.

How you answer seems to depend on whether you support charter schools. Advocates argue they are unequivocally public because they...
